overview: Aaliyah Hadid will do anything to keep her family safe so when a man with a badge shows up at her house with questions about her husband, she offers up her ass! Violet Myer's stepmother wants grandchildren so badly that she locks Violet and her husband in the bedroom and won't let them out until Violet is pregnant! Milu is very devout but when her stepbrother sees her without her hijab on she gets in big trouble. she's sent to her room but stepbro is there to console her! Maya Farrell loves her culture but she's heartbroken when she finds out she has to go through with an arranged marriage. Her stepbrother offers to teach her all about sex!
title: Hijab Hookups 2
